kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.arg: Welcome back! Please select method to sign in
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Do forget pass with missing email
Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.arg: Reset password link will be sent to your email Please enter your email
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Contains
kw.arg: xpath=//div[@class='form-group']//input[@placeholder='Type your email' and @type='email' and @class='form-control' and @required='']/following-sibling::div[@class='invalid-feedback' and text()='Email is required']
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` contains ``text``.

kw.name: Get Current Date
kw.doc: Returns current local or UTC time with an optional increment.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Set Screenshot Directory
kw.doc: Sets the directory for captured screenshots.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Reload Page
kw.doc: Simulates user reloading page.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
